QuestData.Title: Salhet the Tactician
QuestData.Description: Ever since I was a cub, I've always wanted to be a general.$B$BI was eager to join the army. But as you've seen, my combat skills are not all quite there.$B$BThis is not the first time I've been sent to kill hyenas. As a matter of fact, I get sent here so often, that I've befriended these lions and trained them to do my bidding.$B$BThey are my soldiers and at my command they will slay legions of hyenas. Watch!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Salhet and slay 30 Bloodsnarl Scavengers.
QuestData.RewardText: Not bad, huh? Maybe you can put a word in with the high commander.$B$BMaybe he'll put us in charge of our own squad!
